data.name: Alternate Steam Machine
data.detailed_description:
The ALTERNATE Steam Machine brings the power of PC Gaming to your living room along with a library of over 1,000 games! Additionally, the Alternate Steam Machine allows you to stream any Steam game from your PC to your TV over your in-home network.

The Steam Controller lets you play your entire collection of Steam games on your TV—even the ones designed without controller support in mind.

Key Features:

  • Great CPU and Graphicspower for enthusiast Gaming
  • Easy to change components with high extensibility
  • Huge field of application due to Desktop Hardware

data.short_description: The ALTERNATE Steam Machine combines powerful PC gaming with the easy handling of a gaming console. Thanks to Valves unique operating system SteamOS, all important functions can be controlled without classical input devices.
